thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: Alpha Flight Guru reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text:
I have satisfactorily used Alpha Guru on several previous occasions, so that the high quality service provided to me regarding my current requirement for flights to Zurich came as no surprise. GARY was polite, knowledgeable and exceedingly helpful in ensuring that my specific travel requirements could be accommodated. He was thorough and very professional throughout the whole of the booking process.
Over a period of many years I have used a variety of agents for business class travel, with varying degrees of success. I have found that that Alpha Guru is a cut above most such agents. The coupling of very competitive prices with a consistent ability to to customize travel arrangements to best meet sometimes difficult itineraries, is impressive. And all with a minimum of fuss.
For those business class travelers seeking a professional booking service, contacting Alpha Guru will likely be a good solution.
